description:
Part A: Udo is an actor who can barely get any work because of his huge body. Because he ends up attracting more attention than the lead actor, he is even let go from the role of a passerby. He then runs into Moguro and receives some advice. He then manages to get much more popular, but...
 
Part B: Doraki spends many of his nights late night at a family restaurant. Doraki is quite the night owl and his schedule had been becoming completely opposite than his girlfriend’s and it was troubling him. One day, Moguro gives him an item that’ll help him become a day person, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Lease This Monster / Tonight`s Another Awesome Night
Monster zu mieten / Eine weitere phönomenale Nacht
Un succès monstre – Encore une nuit
かいぶつかします / 今夜も最高
